resources.string: In simple mode only basic functionality will be available from the main screen. Result is rounded up to 5 digits, degrees are used as the default angle units.
In engineer mode special functions will be used on the main screen. Result is is not rounded and is presented in engineer notation, radians are used as the default angle units.
Excellent! Tap the button one more time to try again
Tap the button below once to use 9
Drag from the center of the button up to use %
Drag from the center of the button to the left to use sin
Drag from the center of the button down to use ^2
Calculator++ is free and open-source: all the features are free of charge and source code can be found on github.
There are several ways how you can help to make this app better:
Calculator in separate window allows you to do calculations while using other apps on your device
Enable calculator in separate window (second icon will appear in the apps list)
Drag button is an exclusive feature of Calculator++ which provides fast access to the secondary functions
Θέλετε σίγουρα να τελειώσετε τον οδηγό;
